data.name: 生死线 Dead Line - DLC1 黑鹰坠落 Fallen Down
data.detailed_description:
DLC 1 Fallen Down

In order to run DLC1, we need have main part

Open the second level ，Added a new map， Extend the follow-up story

Location:Rooftop
Objective:Chase Robert and Martin

When Storm Team pursued M and R to the rooftop of Rahm Building, M and R had boarded a helicopter and were going to flee. The squad hit the pilot during a clash with mass of the terrorists and the helicopter's fire. Finally, the copter was hit from which a RPG fired by an unknown person and crashed. Late, Storm Team proceeded to crash site and even found M and R had all gone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: I5 3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
